document.full_text: justice landau, a refugee from nazi germany and a member of the israeli supreme court for nearly 30 years, was the presiding judge in the war-crimes trial of adolf eichmann.
document.title: moshe landau dies at 99; oversaw eichmann trial
lines_and_colors: justice landau, a refugee from nazi germany and a member of the israeli supreme court for nearly 30 years, was the presiding judge in the war-crimes trial of adolf eichmann.
